SEARCH
Module squire
Package squire.circuit

Interface CombinableCircuitModifier

All Superinterfaces:
CircuitModifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
CNOTGate, ComplexMatrix, CZGate, HGate, IGate, QuantumGate, RXGate, RYGate, RZGate, SGate, SwapGate, TGate, XGate, YGate, ZGate
public non-sealed interface CombinableCircuitModifier extends CircuitModifier
The CombinableCircuitModifier interface extends CircuitModifier and represents a circuit modifier that can be combined with another CombinableCircuitModifier for circuit optimization. Implementing classes must provide methods to combine with another modifier and represent the modification as a ComplexMatrix.
See Also:
  • CircuitModifier
  • ComplexMatrix

    Methods inherited from interface squire.circuit.CircuitModifier

    apply

  • Method Details

    • combine

      CircuitModifier combine(CombinableCircuitModifier c)
      Combines this combinable circuit modifier with another combinable circuit modifier. Implementing classes must define the specific rules for combination with another modifier. The resulting modifier should incorporate the combined effect of both modifiers.
      Parameters:
      c - The combinable circuit modifier to be combined with this modifier.
      Returns:
      A new circuit modifier representing the combination of this and the provided modifier.

    • asMatrix

      ComplexMatrix asMatrix()
      Converts this combinable circuit modifier into a complex matrix representation. Implementing classes must define how the modification is represented as a complex matrix. The resulting matrix should capture the transformation applied by this circuit modifier.
      Returns:
      The complex matrix representation of this combinable circuit modifier.
